Definition: Percent of time over the process’s lifetime during which one or more kernels was executing on the GPU.
The ratio of cycles an SM has at least 1 warp assigned (computed from the number of cycles and elapsed cycles)
Occupancy is defined as the ratio of active warps on an SM to the maximum number of active warps supported by the SM
The ratio of cycles the any tensor pipe is active (off the peak sustained elapsed cycles)

Metrics (units): FP Active (%)  for FP64, FP32, FP16
Definition: Ratio of cycles the a particular fp (fp64, fp32 or fp16) pipe is active.
Total/Used/Free/Reserved Frame Buffer of the GPU in MB
The rate of data transmitted / received over NVLink, not including protocol headers. (NVLink bandwidth)
The rate of data transmitted / received over the PCIe bus, including both protocol headers and data payloads. (PCIe bandwidth)
